snippet.title: Sentry Knight Tactics Trailer
snippet.description:
The country of Stonewynn is once again under siege by otherworldly monsters, led by a mysterious and seemingly unstoppable new enemy named Advasma. After witnessing a monster raid on innocent villagers, The Knight, Priestess and Marksman spring to action to save their kingdom. 

The heroes learn a legendary weapon, broken into pieces and scattered across the land, is the only weapon that can defeat this new evil. Under the guidance of an old witch, the heroes set off to assemble the legendary weapon and stop Advasma.

Coming to Steam in 2016!
